name: UpdateCampaignFolder
description:
Update a specific folder used to organize campaigns.

Use this tool to modify the details of an existing campaign folder in Mailchimp. It updates the specified folder to help organize marketing campaigns more efficiently.

parameters.name: campaign_folder_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the campaign folder to be updated.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign folder.

parameters.name: folder_name
parameters.description: The new name to assign to the campaign folder.

value_schema.description: Name to associate with the folder.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the campaign folder.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign folder.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name to associate with the folder.

value_schema.description: Name to associate with the folder.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
